description: This file provides utility functions to extract and format version information from a given 'info' dictionary, handling 'version' data in list or string format, and returning version as a list or string.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts a version list (major, minor, patch) from the 'info' dictionary, handling 'version' as a list or string, with defaults if missing.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Generates a dot-separated version string from the 'info' dictionary using GetVersion().
